metadata.title: Zooplankton surveys of Endeavor Ridge
metadata.description: Zooplankton data from the area of Endeavor Ridge from 1990-1996. Collected in coordination with CTD/rosette data in a multidisciplinary study of ocean ridges (see entry under Hot Vents).
keywords: South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Physical samples exist for this dataset.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Departmental

Use constraints: None
